roleset.name: heat past boiling/melting point without changing state

example.name: Args 0 and 1
example.text: Called pyrolysis or ? gasification , ? it superheats biomass ? organic material such as paper or wood ? to produce a gas that fuels an engine that drives a generator .

propbank.arg: biomass ? organic material such as paper or wood
to produce a gas that fuels an engine that drives a generator

example.name: All args
example.text: The concept is that if you turn off the car while the turbo is red - hot , it can then cause the stationary oil to coke , since it superheats it from 100C to 800C .

example.name: adjectival
example.text: When the IED detonates , this copper cup turns into a shaft of superheated metal that can zip right through any armor , even an M1 's . That 's what they tell me , and I have to believe it .

roleset.note: SUPERHEAT-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from superheat.01-v)
